attributes.action: Allow Opt-Out of TV License or Pay-As-You-Watch
attributes.additional_details:
I feel it is time that in a democratic state, we should be allowed to opt out of paying the BBC national television license fee. I agree that without it, the BBC could not operate in the way it does, but allow the public the choice please.

I would like to see a debate for several options:-

1. Integration of the fee into television packages. (Sky/Virgin). With no increase in package fees to the customer. In effect, the operator covers the cost through advertising.

2. Pay-as-you-watch scheme. Allow viewers to pay for what they use only.

3. Total abolition of the fee. Allow the BBC to advertise and pay their own way.
